createenvironment.name: CreateEnvironment
createenvironment.description: Grants permissions to create a CloudShell environment

createsession.name: CreateSession
createsession.description: Grants permissions to connect to a CloudShell environment from the AWS Management Console

deleteenvironment.name: DeleteEnvironment
deleteenvironment.description: Grants permission to delete a CloudShell environment

describeenvironments.name: DescribeEnvironments
describeenvironments.description: Grants permission to return descriptions of existing user's environments

getenvironmentstatus.name: GetEnvironmentStatus
getenvironmentstatus.description: Grants permission to read a CloudShell environment status

getfiledownloadurls.name: GetFileDownloadUrls
getfiledownloadurls.description: Grants permissions to download files from a CloudShell environment

getfileuploadurls.name: GetFileUploadUrls
getfileuploadurls.description: Grants permissions to upload files to a CloudShell environment

putcredentials.name: PutCredentials
putcredentials.description: Grants permissions to forward console credentials to the environment

startenvironment.name: StartEnvironment
startenvironment.description: Grants permission to start a stopped CloudShell environment

stopenvironment.name: StopEnvironment
stopenvironment.description: Grants permission to stop a running CloudShell environment
